meanings.definition: A plant with bright purple berries.
meanings.sent1: The beautyberries in the garden look so pretty.
meanings.sent2: I picked some beautyberries to make a colorful bouquet.
meanings.sent3: Why did the beautyberries go to school? To get smarter!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a basket of beautyberries, sweet and joyful.
meanings.sent5: The beautyberries glistened in the sunlight, like little jewels on the bush.

meanings.definition: The berries of the beautyberry plant.
meanings.sent1: The birds love to eat beautyberries from the bush.
meanings.sent2: She made a delicious jam using the ripe beautyberries.
meanings.sent3: The beautyberries rolled down the hill, playing a berry game.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled like the dew on the beautyberries in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the beautyberries filled the air, inviting everyone to taste them.
